website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, resilient against high temperatures, and mixes well with other DOT 3 fluids, Johnsen’s Premium brake fluid is a worthwhile choice.
pros: Made for disc, drum, and ABS brake systems
cons: It’s a simple solution that doesn’t do anything that its competition doesn’t

customer_reviews.title: Same high quality and better price than those "other" advertised brand names
customer_reviews.text: This product is on par with ANY high end brand advertised by those high dollar companies.Johnsen’s brand has been a leader in the automotive aftermarket car care business since 1928. Starting with packaging brake fluid, I also found this information: Johnsen’s has been proud to be a part of both, the Tony Stewart and the John Force racing teams since 2002. Both racers have won multiple championships in their respective fields during our partnerships. If these teams trust their product at the speeds they run, I'm very comfortable trusting it in my daily drivers!!!
customer_reviews.author: dAmADtECH

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use on my boat trailer when replacing the calipers and brake fluid in my Titan electric over hydraulic brake system. A gallon was plenty. I read reviews that the package came leaking for other folks. I live in Hawaii, it made it all the way here without any issues. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kenai Cabo

customer_reviews.title: Good value for multiple brake jobs.
customer_reviews.text: I had two brake jobs to do, and since we are sheltered in place for this coronavirus, I ordered supplies online. This jug is large enough to flush the lines on both cars, and was a good value too. Probably too much for just one car though.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Works as brake fluid
customer_reviews.text: I have no way to judge if this is better or worse brake fluid than other brands, but it is clear, shows no problems mixing with the brake fluid already in my car and makes the car stop when I press the pedal. That is a win in my book.
customer_reviews.author: ARE Dad

customer_reviews.title: Works 2006 Acura TL
customer_reviews.text: Replaced all the calipers on a 2006 Acura TL because they were rusty and nasty. Bled the brakes after replacing calipers and used this brake fluid to fill reservoir. Car is stopping as expected. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: RYTIEPSONFSDFOINW

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great value on a good product with very fast shipping included! Who could ask for a better deal?
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Dot 3 brake fluid
customer_reviews.text: It's brake fluid and it's the cheapest I could find. I use it with my power brake bleeder to replace the old contaminated fluid in my car's brake sysem.
customer_reviews.author: G. Omura

customer_reviews.title: Good brake fluid.
customer_reviews.text: Good brake fluid for passenger car application. Probably more fluid than I will ever use, but I can now bleed new fluid into both my vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Boeck

customer_reviews.title: Fine but maybe didn't need it
customer_reviews.text: I got this to do my own brake job but as it turns out maybe I didn't need it as the existing brake fluid was clear and looked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse A. Safir

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to pour without making a mess. Needs a better cap system. Used it in my 2002 Honda Civic and my 2008 Ford Mustang.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery C. May

customer_reviews.title: Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I just completed a master cylinder replacement and flush of the system. I had more than enough fluid to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: walla2k5

customer_reviews.title: OIL was great
customer_reviews.text: The oil was the best buy for the money. It is exact what it was advertised for and was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: *insert tire screeching noise here*
customer_reviews.text: It's DOT-3 brake fluid. My vehicle came to a complete stop
customer_reviews.author: Remrie Arrie

customer_reviews.title: VALUE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: BETTER THAN PAYING FOR A FEW OUNCES AND READILY QUANTITY ON HAND.
customer_reviews.author: tito

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, and works as it should. Will purchase again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Dot 3
customer_reviews.text: It’s dot 3 and cheap what more can you ask for
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, had to replace all brake kunes, plenty to bleed system several times and some to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Hamblin

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quickly and is exactly what I needed, Thanks, Buzz
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but did seem to leak do to being shipped on it’s side.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Arnold Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Deal
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price, brakes work great. I gifted the rest to my mechanic since I can't possibly use this before the fluid expires from moisture absorption. You could do 5-10 flushes with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: RockinReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time I flush my brake system. Works great and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy K

customer_reviews.title: Economical
customer_reviews.text: I was completely bleeding out the brake system on a Kia which requires a lot of fluid, this fluid has worked as it should.
customer_reviews.author: john dragon

customer_reviews.title: 1990 Mazda Miata
customer_reviews.text: 1990 Mazda Miata flushed my entire brake system. I found out I had alot of air bubbles on my rear brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Steve JS

customer_reviews.title: Great brake fluid at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: like the product and it shipped fast! Super price as well
customer_reviews.author: MN GQ

customer_reviews.title: Value priced DOT3 Brake Fluid
customer_reviews.text: Johnsen's is a reputable company and this brake fluid is priced right for the amount you get.
customer_reviews.author: Gary F.

customer_reviews.title: It works as intended
customer_reviews.text: It's brake fluid. It works and was cheaper than buying anywhere in town
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I am happy Amazon sells certain products including this one. For the price of brake fluid per gallon, I am happy 😊
customer_reviews.author: spencer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My items works and good condition, when they have arrived .
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Most economical way to flush my brake system
customer_reviews.text: If you're flushing your brake system this is the way to go. Much cheaper than buying the smaller bottles of fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good product, I used it to flush my brake ...
customer_reviews.text: It's DOT3 fluid and that about it. Good product, I used it to flush my brake system and it works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The seal on the bottle was broken causing it to leak all over the box. Dont know how long the seal was broken or how much moisture may have entered the container before it was shipped to me. Wont be buying this product again
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Bottle was leaking when received but good value cost wise
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: DOT 3 Fluid
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Sebring because DOT 3 Fluid is the only type I can use for it. This was very affordable and is the same as any other brake fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Why do we have to rate it - It works just like break fluid
customer_reviews.text: It's DOT-3 break fluid, Why do we have to rate it - It works just like break fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is like any other oil there is not much to it
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: What a mess
customer_reviews.text: Trying to return it to seal under the cap was open and Spilled throughout the box I still don't know if this product is for GM approved .hydrobros very sensitive
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for major brake work and system cleaning / bleeding
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brake fuid
customer_reviews.text: Brake fluid, worked well and at a reasonable price. The shiiping was fast so it really helped me get the job done on time.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D.
